text: Edward Alfred Evans (4 March 1941 â€“ 12 April 2020) was an Australian senior public servant and economist. He was born in Ipswich, Queensland, Australia. He was a Secretary of the Department of the Treasury from 24 May 1993 through 26 April 2001.Reserve Bank of Australia, 'Past and Present Reserve Bank Board Members', accessed 13 April 2020. As secretary of the Treasury, he was ex officio member of the boards of several financial institutions. He was a director of the Commonwealth Bank of Australia between 1993 and 1996, and a member of the board of the Reserve Bank of Australia from 10 May 1993 to 26 April 2001. Evans died on 12 April 2020, aged 79.Eryk Bagshaw, 'Former Treasury secretary Ted Evans dead at 79', Sydney Morning Herald, 12 April 2020. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Australian economists Category:Australian civil servants Category:Politicians from Queensland
title: Ted Evans (public servant)
